TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionStateItemCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type ISessionStateItemCollection = interface interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 工作階段狀態用來管理工作階段的集合所使用的合約。

span.span: Defines the contract for the collection used by ASP.NET session state to manage session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會定義公開給應用程式程式碼的工作階段項目集合類別。The interface defines the collection of session items exposed to application code by the class. ASP.NET 實作介面是類別。The ASP.NET implementation of the interface is the class. 如果您建立衍生自類別類別來儲存工作階段資料，您可以使用類別來管理預存的物件，或實作您自己的集合管理員上的介面。If you create a class derived from the class to store session data, you can either use the class to manage the stored objects or implement the interface on your own collection manager. 如果您實作介面，您必須建立繼承的類別類別，以便讓使用您管理工作階段變數的實作。If you implement the interface, you must also create a class that inherits the class in order to make use of your implementation to manage session variables. 實作也必須實作的成員介面。An implementation must also implement the members of the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作，並使用類別來儲存工作階段狀態變數的名稱和值。The following code example implements the and uses the class to store session-state variable names and values.
